entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of freezing rain beginning early this evening. Freezing rain or periods of snow this evening. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
